explains: adj. 盛开的；妙龄的；该死的；十足的
v. 开花；繁荣；发光；给（透镜）敷膜；把（金属）压成块（bloom 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The red flowers, blooming like burning fire, light up her world.
sentences.cn: 那些红色的花朵像燃烧的火一样绽放，照亮了她的世界。

sentences.en: Quantities of flowers were blooming everywhere, filling the air with perfume.
sentences.cn: 遍地鲜花盛开，空气中弥漫着芬芳。
